purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 戒 [ jiè ] to warn, to admonish; to swear off, to avoid
heisig_chinese_memo: When you warn someone you are asking them to take precautions against something base on your words.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To warn someone is to give them words which the can use to take precautions against the future.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " word ", " ring " sound, the original meaning is cautioned advice. "Shuowen": "Emperor Ye. From words, warning." "Historical Records: The Family of Lu Zhougong": "Zhou Gongzang's policy is in the golden pit, and the defenders are advised not to speak."

" Commands " can mean proverbs. "Yi·Xi Ci 2": "Small punishment and great admonition, the blessing of this villain."

" Caution " also means instructions and notices. "Xunzi·Strengthen the Country": "Send command and order and the enemy retreats, it is the prestige."

" Command " also expresses maxims and dogma. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Qin Peng Biography": "It is to set the four commandments for people to determine the rituals of six relatives and children."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " word ", " ring " sound, the original meaning is cautioned advice.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「戒」聲，本義為告誡、規勸。《說文》：「敕也。从言，戒聲。」《史記·魯周公世家》：「周公藏其策金縢匱中，誡守者勿敢言。」

　　「誡」可表示箴言。《易‧繫辭下》：「小懲而大誡，此小人之福也。」

　　「誡」也表示訓令、告示。《荀子·彊國》：「發誡布令而敵退，是主威也。」

　　「誡」還表示格言、教條。《後漢書·秦彭傳》：「乃為人設四誡，以定六親長幼之禮。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「戒」聲，本義為告誡、規勸。

從「 言 」，「 戒 」聲，本義為告誡、規勸。《說文》：「敕也。从言，戒聲。」《史記·魯周公世家》：「周公藏其策金縢匱中，誡守者勿敢言。」 「 誡 」可表示箴言。《易‧繫辭下》：「小懲而大誡，此小人之福也。」 「 誡 」也表示訓令、告示。《荀子·彊國》：「發誡布令而敵退，是主威也。」 「 誡 」還表示格言、教條。《後漢書·秦彭傳》：「乃為人設四誡，以定六親長幼之禮。」
From the " word", " ring" sound, the original meaning is cautioned advice. "Shuowen": "Emperor Ye. From words, warning." "Historical Records: The Family of Lu Zhougong": "Zhou Gongzang's policy is in the golden pit, and the defenders are advised not to speak." " Commands" can mean proverbs. "Yi·Xi Ci 2": "Small punishment and great admonition, the blessing of this villain." " Caution" also means instructions and notices. "Xunzi·Strengthen the Country": "Send command and order and the enemy retreats, it is the prestige." " Command" also expresses maxims and dogma. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Qin Peng Biography": "It is to set the four commandments for people to determine the rituals of six relatives and children."

誡字的基本解释

誡
jiè
见“诫”。

誡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiè］
［《廣韻》古拜切，去怪，見。］
“诫1”的繁体字。
(1)警告；告戒。
(2)戒备；警惕。
(3)嘱告。
(4)教令。
(5)文体名。一种规劝、告戒的文章。
(6)指佛教戒律。
(7)通“駭”。《易·比》：“顯比，王用三驅，失前禽，邑人不誡。”俞樾《群经平议·周易一》：“誡當讀爲駭……邑人不誡，言不驚駭也。”一说为惩罚。见高亨《周易大传今注》。

誡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誡； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第13
【唐韻】古拜切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居拜切，?音戒。【說文】敕也。【玉篇】命也，告也。【廣韻】言警也。【增韻】警敕之辭曰誡。【易·比卦】邑人不誡。又【繫辭】小懲而大誡。【左傳·桓十一年】鄖人軍其郊，必不誡。【史記·周本紀】乃命伯臩申誡太僕。【荀子·强國篇】發誡布令而敵退，是主威也。【文中子·問易篇】君子思過而預防之，所以有誡也。【正韻】?與戒同。　又劒名。【刀劒錄】秦昭王鑄一劒，長三尺，銘曰誡。　又叶居吏切，音記。【劉向·列女頌】雖曰女則，亦實男誡。男女覽兹，厥事甚備。　又【類篇】或作䛺。【字彙補】譌作?，非。

commandment
Basic explanation of words
commandment
jiè
See "commandments".
commandment
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiè］
["Guangyun" Gubai cut, go to blame, see. ]
The traditional characters of "Command 1".
(1) Warning; warning.
(2) Beware; be vigilant.
(3) Advice.
(4) Decree.
(5) The name of the style. An article of exhortation and warning.
(6) Refers to Buddhist precepts.
(7) Through "hack". "Yi Bi": "Xianbi, the king uses three drives, loses the predators, the people do not command." Yuyue "Qunjing Pingyi·Zhou Yiyi": "The commandment should be read as horror... Horrified." One said it was punishment. See Gao Heng's "Zhou Yi Da Chuan Jin Zhu".
commandment
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Commandment; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1163, 13
[Tang Yun] Gubaiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Jubaiqie, ringtones. [Said the text] Evil also. [Jade articles] Fate, also tell. [Guang Yun] The warning is also. [Add rhyme] The words of the warning edict is a commandment. [Easy Bigua] The people of the town do not admonish. Also 【Ciphon】Small punishment and big admonishment. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year of Huan] Yunren's army in its suburbs must not be admonished. [Historical Records·Zhou Benji] He ordered Boqin to command Taipu. 【Xunzi·Strengthening the Country】Issuing admonitions and orders and the enemy retreats, it is the master of prestige. [Wen Zhongzi · Questions and Changes] A gentleman thinks about it and prevents it, so there is a commandment. [Zheng Yun]? Same as ring.　 Another name. 【Record of Swordsmanship】The king of Qin Zhao cast a 劒, three feet long, inscribed and said the commandment.　 Ye Ju staff cut again, sound notes. 【Liu Xiang·Lie Nv Ode】Although it is said that women do, they are also true to men. Men and women read here, and they are very prepared.　[Classes] or as I. 【Word Supplement】Zhao Zuo?, no.
